trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 類別的 <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" /> 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> events pass an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> to the handler for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 當這些事件引發時，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件可傳遞的執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>至相關聯的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>屬性會取得新的層級的音訊輸入時<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: `AudioLevel`屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>類別提供語音辨識引擎的音訊輸入的目前層級。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an event handler to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將事件處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>物件。

trans-unit.source: The handler outputs the new audio level to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式會輸出到主控台的新音訊層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new level of audio input after the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> or the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得引發 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> 或 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" /> 事件之後，音訊輸入新的層級。

trans-unit.source: The new level of audio input.
